Package interactr.cs.kuleuven.be.ui

Class DiagramController

  • java.lang.Object
    • interactr.cs.kuleuven.be.ui.DiagramController

  • public class DiagramController
extends java.lang.Object
    A class of diagram controllers for managing a diagram and associated diagram views. Diagram controllers allow for manipulation and selection of diagram components such as parties and messages, as well as cycling between available diagram views.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      DiagramController​()
      Initialize this new diagram controller with a communication & sequence view, and an empty diagram.
      DiagramController​(Diagram diagram, java.util.ArrayList<DiagramView> views)
      Initialize this new diagram controller with given diagram and diagram views.

                throws InvalidAddPartyException

        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate for the new party.
        y - The y coordinate for the new party.
        Throws:
        InvalidAddPartyException - The given coordinates point to a component already.
